list.name: Display OOM Kills
list.textFormat: Container "{{container}}" in pod "{{namespace}}/{{pod}}" has been killed.

description: A dashboard to visualize metrics about the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/tree/master/vertical-pod-autoscaler) using the generated Prometheus metrics of the Kube-State-Metrics (https://github.com/kubernetes/kube-state-metrics/blob/master/docs/verticalpodautoscaler-metrics.md)

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_upperbound{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

panels.description: Shows the recommendation that the VPA calculates. The graph also shows the actual usage of each container.

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName-(.+)", container=~"$container"}[2m])) by (container,pod)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_target{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_lowerbound{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_upperbound{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

panels.title: VPA CPU Recommendation vs CPU Usage

panels.description:
Shows the recommendation of the VPA and compares it to the requests and limits of all containers in a pod. 

**Requests and/or limits may not reflect useful values if they are not defined for each container in a pod.

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_target{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", target_name="$targetName", container=~"$container", resource="cpu", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName(.+)", container=~"$container"}) by (container,pod)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName(.+)", container=~"$container"}) by (container,pod)

panels.title: VPA CPU Recommendation vs Limits & Requests

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_target{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", target_name="$targetName", container=~"$container", resource="cpu", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

panels.description: If there are several containers, the average is calculated

targets.expr: avg(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName-(.+)", container=~"$container"}[2m])) by(container)

panels.title: Actual Usage

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_lowerbound{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_upperbound{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

panels.description: Shows the recommendations that the VPA calculates. The graph also shows the actual usage of each container.

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName(.+)", container=~"$container"}) by (container,pod)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_target{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_lowerbound{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_upperbound{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

panels.title: VPA Memory Recommendation vs Memory Usage

panels.description:
Shows the recommendation of the VPA and compares it to the requests and limits of all containers in a pod. 

**Requests and/or limits may not reflect useful values if they are not defined for each container in a pod.

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_target{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", target_name="$targetName", container=~"$container", resource="memory", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName(.+)", container=~"$container"}) by (container,pod)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName(.+)", container=~"$container"}) by (container,pod)

panels.title: VPA Memory Recommendation vs Limits & Requests

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_target{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", target_name="$targetName", container=~"$container", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

panels.description: If there are several containers, the average is calculated

targets.expr: avg(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".*$targetName(.+)", container=~"$container"}) by(container)

panels.title: Actual Usage

targets.expr: sum(kube_customresource_vpa_containerrecommendations_lowerbound{resource="memory", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", target_name="$targetName", verticalpodautoscaler=~"$vpa"}) by (container)

sum(
  count_over_time(
    {namespace="vpa"} |= `reason="EvictedPod"` | logfmt | pattern `<_> object="<namespace_extracted>/<vpa>" <_> Pod <pod_extracted> <_>` 
    | namespace_extracted=~"$namespace" | vpa=~"$vpa"
  [$__range])
)

{namespace="vpa"} |= `reason="EvictedPod"` | logfmt | pattern `<_> object="<namespace_extracted>/<vpa>" <_> Pod <pod_extracted> <_>` 
| namespace_extracted=~"$namespace" | vpa=~"$vpa"
| line_format `VPA Updater evicted Pod {{.pod_extracted}} in Namespace {{.namespace_extracted}} to apply resource recommendation (VPA resource: {{.vpa}}).`

{namespace="vpa"} |= `"OOM detected"` 
| pattern `<_> oomInfo={"Timestamp":"<oom_timestamp>","Memory":<memory>,"ContainerID":{"Namespace":"<namespace_extracted>","PodName":"<pod_extracted>","ContainerName":"<container_extracted>"}}`
| namespace_extracted=~"$namespace"
| line_format "OOM detected at {{.oom_timestamp}} for Container {{.container_extracted}} in Pod {{.pod_extracted}} in Namespace {{.namespace_extracted}} (Last observed memory used: {{div .memory 1048576 }}MB)."

panels.title: Out of Memory Detections (OOM) & Eviction Logs

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
    {namespace="vpa"} |= `reason="EvictedPod"` | logfmt | pattern `<_> object="<namespace_extracted>/<vpa>" <_> Pod <pod_extracted> <_>` 
    | namespace_extracted=~"$namespace" | vpa=~"$vpa"
[10m])

sum(
  count_over_time(
    {namespace="vpa"} |= "OOM detected" |= `"Namespace":"$namespace"`
  [$__range])
)

count by(namespace_extracted,pod_extracted,reason)(
    count_over_time(
        {namespace="vpa"} |= `Not updating` | pattern `<_> "<reason>" pod="<namespace_extracted>/<pod_extracted>"` 
        | namespace_extracted=~"$namespace" |~ "$pods.+"
    [2m])
)

title: VPA Recommendations
